title: Basic Tactics
sub_title: These are the basic tactics for commanding a battle. Send out your echelons once you master them!

title: Obtaining T-Dolls
sub_title: First, you must understand how to construct Tactical Dolls.

title: T-Doll Improvement
sub_title: Let's learn about the various ways in which you can improve your T-Dolls!

title: T-Doll Enhancement
sub_title: Strengthening your T-Dolls' attributes is a vital part of improving their fighting power.

title: Dummy-Linking
sub_title: This links Dummies to your T-Dolls and provides a noticeable improvement in combat effectiveness.

title: Skill Improvement
sub_title: Don't forget to level up your T-Dolls' skills!

title: Novice Tactics
sub_title: Starting to battles more difficult? Study the contents of this section to improve your combat ability!

title: Equipment Acquisition
sub_title: Gear up your Dolls with equipment to improve their performance in battle.

title: Equipment Enhancement
sub_title: Enhance your equipment to maximize their effect.

title: Intermediate Tactics
sub_title: Tactical Fairies have been introduced in Griffin. Understanding them will make your battles more successful!

title: Obtaining Fairies
sub_title: Bring Tactical Fairies into the fight!

title: Advanced Tactics
sub_title: We face an increasingly ruthless battlefield. Upgrade your T-Dolls' neural clouds and deploy the Heavy Ordnance Corps!

title: Neural Upgrade
sub_title: It's is time to upgrade their neural clouds. Please help them overcome their limits.

title: Heavy Ordnance Corps
sub_title: The HOC are ready. Please proceed to improve them through further research and development.
